This section uses data from the `r AppliedPredictiveModeling` package and functions from the `r caret`, `r corrplot`, and `r lattice` packages.

# Getting started
Load the data set into **R**:
```{r load.package.data, results="hide"}
library(AppliedPredictiveModeling)
data(segmentationOriginal)
```
```{r}
segmentationOriginal <- tbl_df(segmentationOriginal)
## Retain only the 'training' set
library(dplyr)
segTrain <- filter(segmentationOriginal, Case == "Train")
## Remove the first three columns (identifier columns)
segTrainX <- select(segTrain, -(1:3))
segTrainClass <- segTrain$Class
```
